trans-unit.source: Holds a message returned in response to a method call on a remote object.
trans-unit.target: 包含在远程对象上调用方法的响应中返回一条消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ReturnMessage"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ReturnMessage"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The exception that was thrown during execution of the remotely called method.
trans-unit.target: 远程调用的方法在执行期间引发异常。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage"></xref> with which to create an instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ReturnMessage"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage"> </xref>用来创建的实例<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ReturnMessage"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ReturnMessage"></xref> class with all the information returning to the caller after the method call.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ReturnMessage"></xref>方法调用后返回到调用方的所有信息的类。

trans-unit.source: The object returned by the invoked method from which the current <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ReturnMessage"></xref> instance originated.
trans-unit.target: 从中返回被调用的方法的对象当前<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ReturnMessage"></xref>产生的实例。

trans-unit.source: The objects returned from the invoked method as <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> parameters.
trans-unit.target: 从作为调用的方法返回的对象<xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref>参数。

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> parameters returned from the invoked method.
trans-unit.target: 数<xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref>从调用的方法的参数返回。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext"></xref> of the method call.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext"> </xref>方法调用。

trans-unit.source: The original method call to the invoked method.
trans-unit.target: 对所调用方法的原始方法调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of arguments of the called method.
trans-unit.target: 获取所调用方法的参数的数目。

trans-unit.source: The number of arguments of the called method.
trans-unit.target: 所调用方法的参数的数目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a specified argument passed to the method called on the remote object.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定的参数传递到远程对象上调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: An argument passed to the method called on the remote object.
trans-unit.target: 参数传递到远程对象上调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that was thrown during the remote method call.
trans-unit.target: 获取远程方法调用过程中引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: The exception thrown during the method call, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if an exception did not occur during the call.
trans-unit.target: 方法调用中，过程中引发的异常或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果过程调用中没有发生异常。

trans-unit.source: Returns a specified argument passed to the remote method during the method call.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定的自变量，方法调用期间传递给远程方法。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the requested argument.
trans-unit.target: 请求参数的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: An argument passed to the remote method during the method call.
trans-unit.target: 在方法调用期间，自变量传递给远程的方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of a specified method argument.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定的方法自变量的名称。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the requested argument name.
trans-unit.target: 请求的自变量名称的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: The name of a specified method argument.
trans-unit.target: 指定的方法自变量的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the object passed as an <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> parameter during the remote method call.
trans-unit.target: 返回作为传递的对象<xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref>期间远程方法调用的参数。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the requested <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 所请求的从零开始索引<xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref>参数。

trans-unit.source: The object passed as an <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> parameter during the remote method call.
trans-unit.target: 将对象传递作为<xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref>期间远程方法调用的参数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of a specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> parameter passed to the remote method.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定的名称<xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref>参数传递给远程方法。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the requested argument.
trans-unit.target: 请求参数的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the name of the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> parameter, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the current method is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 表示的指定名称的字符串<xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref>参数，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果当前方法未实现。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the called method accepts a variable number of arguments.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示调用的方法是否接受数目可变的参数。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the called method accepts a variable number of arguments; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果调用的方法接受数目可变的参数;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext"></xref> of the called method.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext"></xref>所调用方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext"></xref> of the called method.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext"> </xref>所调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase> of the called method.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase>所调用方法。</xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase> of the called method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase>所调用方法。</xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the called method.
trans-unit.target: 获取所调用的方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method that the current <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ReturnMessage"></xref> originated from.
trans-unit.target: 方法的名称，当前<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ReturnMessage"></xref>源自。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of <xref:System.Type> objects containing the method signature.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个数组<xref:System.Type>对象包含的方法签名。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Type> objects containing the method signature.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref:System.Type>对象包含的方法签名。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> arguments on the called method.
trans-unit.target: 获取数<xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref>上调用的方法的自变量。

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> arguments on the called method.
trans-unit.target: 数<xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref>上调用的方法的自变量。

trans-unit.source: Gets a specified object passed as an <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> parameter to the called method.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定的对象作为传递<xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref>为调用的方法的参数。

trans-unit.source: An object passed as an <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref> parameter to the called method.
trans-unit.target: 作为传递的对象<xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_ref" name="ref" href=""></xref>为调用的方法的参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of properties contained in the current <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ReturnMessage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>中当前包含属性的<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ReturnMessage"> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of properties contained in the current <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ReturnMessage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>中当前包含属性的<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ReturnMessage"> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets the object returned by the called method.
trans-unit.target: 获取所调用的方法返回的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object returned by the called method.
trans-unit.target: 返回被调用方法的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the type on which the remote method was called.
trans-unit.target: 获取在其调用远程方法类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: The type name of the remote object on which the remote method was called.
trans-unit.target: 远程对象在其调用远程方法类型名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URI of the remote object on which the remote method was called.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在其调用远程方法的远程对象的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the remote object on which the remote method was called.
trans-unit.target: 在其调用远程方法的远程对象的 URI。
